description:
gam can use univariate penalized cubic regression spline smooths, specified via terms like
s(x,bs="cr"). s(x,bs="cs") specifies a penalized cubic regression spline which has had its penalty modified 
to shrink towards zero at high enough smoothing parameters (as the smoothing parameter goes to infinity a normal cubic spline tends to a 
straight line.) s(x,bs="cc") specifies a cyclic penalized cubic regression spline smooth.
